verses.verse: אַחַ֣ר ׀ <S%H310><s%> After הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> these things הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְרָ֔ם <S%H87><s%> unto Abram בַּֽמַּחֲזֶ֖ה <S%H4236><s%> in a vision לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֣א <S%H3372><s%> Fear אַבְרָ֗ם <S%H87><s%> not Abram אָנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I מָגֵ֣ן <S%H4043><s%> I [am] thy shield לָ֔ךְ שְׂכָרְךָ֖ <S%H7939><s%> reward הַרְבֵּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> great מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> [and] thy exceeding

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אַבְרָ֗ם <S%H87><s%> And Abram אֲדֹנָ֤י <S%H136><s%> Lord יֱהוִה֙ <S%H3069><s%> GOD מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what תִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> what wilt thou give לִ֔י וְאָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> me הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> me seeing I go עֲרִירִ֑י <S%H6185><s%> childless וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted מֶ֣שֶׁק <S%H4943><s%> steward בֵּיתִ֔י <S%H1004><s%> of my house ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> [is] this דַּמֶּ֥שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> Damascus אֱלִיעֶֽזֶר׃ <S%H461><s%> Eliezer

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אַבְרָ֔ם <S%H87><s%> And Abram הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> Since לִ֔י לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no נָתַ֖תָּה <S%H5414><s%> Behold to me thou hast given זָ֑רַע <S%H2233><s%> seed וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> and lo one born בֵּיתִ֖י <S%H1004><s%> in my house יוֹרֵ֥שׁ <S%H3423><s%> is mine heir אֹתִֽי׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> behold דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And behold the word יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> [came] unto him saying לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִֽירָשְׁךָ֖ <S%H3423><s%> This shall not be thine heir זֶ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> This כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אִם֙ <S%H518><s%> but אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who יֵצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> but he that shall come forth מִמֵּעֶ֔יךָ <S%H4578><s%> out of thine own bowels ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִֽירָשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H3423><s%> shall be thine heir

וַיּוֹצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> And he brought him forth אֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> הַח֗וּצָה <S%H2351><s%> abroad וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said הַבֶּט־ <S%H5027><s%> Look נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Now הַשָּׁמַ֗יְמָה <S%H8064><s%> now toward heaven וּסְפֹר֙ <S%H5608><s%> and tell הַכּ֣וֹכָבִ֔ים <S%H3556><s%> the stars אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if תּוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> if thou be able לִסְפֹּ֣ר <S%H5608><s%> to number אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> them and he said ל֔וֹ כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> unto him So יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become זַרְעֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2233><s%> shall thy seed
וְהֶאֱמִ֖ן <S%H539><s%> And he believed בַּֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD וַיַּחְשְׁבֶ֥הָ <S%H2803><s%> and he counted לּ֖וֹ צְדָקָֽה׃ <S%H6666><s%> it to him for righteousness

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> about אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> unto him I [am] the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who הוֹצֵאתִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H3318><s%> that brought thee out מֵא֣וּר <S%H218><s%> of Ur כַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldees לָ֧תֶת <S%H5414><s%> to give לְךָ֛ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thee this land הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> to inherit

וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> Lord יֱהוִ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD בַּמָּ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> whereby אֵדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> shall I know כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אִֽירָשֶֽׁנָּה׃ <S%H3423><s%> that I shall inherit it

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him קְחָ֥ה <S%H3947><s%> unto him Take לִי֙ עֶגְלָ֣ה <S%H5697><s%> me an heifer מְשֻׁלֶּ֔שֶׁת <S%H8027><s%> of three years old וְעֵ֥ז <S%H5795><s%> and a she goat מְשֻׁלֶּ֖שֶׁת <S%H8027><s%> of three years old וְאַ֣יִל <S%H352><s%> and a ram מְשֻׁלָּ֑שׁ <S%H8027><s%> of three years old וְתֹ֖ר <S%H8449><s%> and a turtledove וְגוֹזָֽל׃ <S%H1469><s%> and a young pigeon

וַיִּֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> And he took ל֣וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וַיְבַתֵּ֤ר <S%H1334><s%> unto him all these and divided אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> בַּתָּ֔וֶךְ <S%H8432><s%> them in the midst וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and laid אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> each בִּתְר֖וֹ <S%H1335><s%> piece לִקְרַ֣את <S%H7125><s%> one against רֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> another וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצִפֹּ֖ר <S%H6833><s%> but the birds לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not בָתָֽר׃ <S%H1334><s%> divided

וַיֵּ֥רֶד <S%H3381><s%> came down הָעַ֖יִט <S%H5861><s%> And when the fowls עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הַפְּגָרִ֑ים <S%H6297><s%> upon the carcases וַיַּשֵּׁ֥ב <S%H5380><s%> drove them away אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> אַבְרָֽם׃ <S%H87><s%> Abram

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become הַשֶּׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <S%H8121><s%> And when the sun לָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> was going down וְתַרְדֵּמָ֖ה <S%H8639><s%> a deep sleep נָפְלָ֣ה <S%H5307><s%> fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon אַבְרָ֑ם <S%H87><s%> upon Abram וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold אֵימָ֛ה <S%H367><s%> and lo an horror חֲשֵׁכָ֥ה <S%H2825><s%> darkness גְדֹלָ֖ה <S%H1419><s%> of great נֹפֶ֥לֶת <S%H5307><s%> fell עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לְאַבְרָ֗ם <S%H87><s%> unto Abram יָדֹ֨עַ <S%H3045><s%> Know תֵּדַ֜ע <S%H3045><s%> of a surety כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גֵ֣ר ׀ <S%H1616><s%> shall be a stranger יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become זַרְעֲךָ֗ <S%H2233><s%> that thy seed בְּאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> in a land לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not לָהֶ֔ם וַעֲבָד֖וּם <S%H5647><s%> [that is] not theirs and shall serve וְעִנּ֣וּ <S%H6031><s%> them and they shall afflict אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> אַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> them four מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וְגַ֧ם <S%H1571><s%> will also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגּ֛וֹי <S%H1471><s%> And also that nation אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom יַעֲבֹ֖דוּ <S%H5647><s%> whom they shall serve דָּ֣ן <S%H1777><s%> will I judge אָנֹ֑כִי <S%H595><s%> I וְאַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> after that כֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יֵצְא֖וּ <S%H3318><s%> shall they come out בִּרְכֻ֥שׁ <S%H7399><s%> substance גָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> with great

וְאַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> you תָּב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> And thou shalt go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> to thy fathers בְּשָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> in peace תִּקָּבֵ֖ר <S%H6912><s%> thou shalt be buried בְּשֵׂיבָ֥ה <S%H7872><s%> old age טוֹבָֽה׃ <S%H2896><s%> in a good

וְד֥וֹר <S%H1755><s%> generation רְבִיעִ֖י <S%H7243><s%> But in the fourth יָשׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> again הֵ֑נָּה <S%H2008><s%> they shall come hither כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁלֵ֛ם <S%H8003><s%> full עֲוֹ֥ן <S%H5771><s%> for the iniquity הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2008><s%> [is] not yet

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> came הַשֶּׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <S%H8121><s%> And it came to pass that when the sun בָּ֔אָה <S%H935><s%> went down וַעֲלָטָ֖ה <S%H5939><s%> and it was dark הָיָ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> came וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold תַנּ֤וּר <S%H8574><s%> furnace עָשָׁן֙ <S%H6227><s%> behold a smoking וְלַפִּ֣יד <S%H3940><s%> lamp אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> and a burning אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָבַ֔ר <S%H5674><s%> that passed בֵּ֖ין <S%H996><s%> between הַגְּזָרִ֥ים <S%H1506><s%> those pieces הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> In the same כָּרַ֧ת <S%H3772><s%> made יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אַבְרָ֖ם <S%H87><s%> with Abram בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> a covenant לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying לְזַרְעֲךָ֗ <S%H2233><s%> Unto thy seed נָתַ֙תִּי֙ <S%H5414><s%> have I given אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> this land הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> From מִנְּהַ֣ר <S%H5104><s%> from the river מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far הַנָּהָ֥ר <S%H5104><s%> river הַגָּדֹ֖ל <S%H1419><s%> unto the great נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> the river פְּרָֽת׃ <S%H6578><s%> Euphrates
אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקֵּינִי֙ <S%H7017><s%> The Kenites וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקְּנִזִּ֔י <S%H7074><s%> and the Kenizzites וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> הַקַּדְמֹנִֽי׃ <S%H6935><s%> and the Kadmonites
וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחִתִּ֥י <S%H2850><s%> And the Hittites וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפְּרִזִּ֖י <S%H6522><s%> and the Perizzites וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרְפָאִֽים׃ <S%H7497><s%> and the Rephaims

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאֱמֹרִי֙ <S%H567><s%> And the Amorites וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <S%H3669><s%> and the Canaanites וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגִּרְגָּשִׁ֖י <S%H1622><s%> and the Girgashites וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <S%H2983><s%> and the Jebusites ס
